entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:21 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -37.2°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:18 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:18 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:18 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
